General.Name: Xiamen Goldenhome Co Ltd
General.Description: GoldenHome Living Co., Ltd. research, design, develops, produces, sells, installs, and services integrated kitchen cabinets, and customized and smart home products in China. It also offers wardrobes, bathroom cabinets, wooden doors, and smart home appliances. The company sells its products through a network of 1720 kitchen cabinet stores; 919 wardrobe stores; and 388 wooden door stores. GoldenHome Living Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.
